mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.icon, m.path, m.component, m.parent_id, m.perms FROM frame_sys_menu AS m LEFT JOIN frame_sys_role_menu AS rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN frame_sys_role AS r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN frame_sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN frame_sys_user AS u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.visible = 0
